meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Johnny Marigliano Jean Dupon Eureka Nutt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6076.

td.p: Johnny Marigliano, a pizza maker originally from Brooklyn, New York
Jean Dupon, a college chemistry instructor from San Carlos, California
Eureka Nutt, a paralegal from Canoga Park, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,801)

tr.td: GOOD GNUS
THE MUSIC OF CANADA
CHILI PEPPERS
TREBEKS IN ART HISTORY
THE STATE OF EVERYTHING
VOCABULARY
